Hurry up ğŸ©´ï¼š

ğŸ‰ In the separate open mode, you can open files much faster.
ğŸ­ Editing mode supports split screen use, the adaptive display of three buttons at the upper left corner.

Easy to use ğŸ‰ï¼š

ğŸ¶ Compared with V1.1.0, Fixes the flicker of PPT export, Optimization of preview experience, Supports the use of todolist.
ğŸ‰ Support more simple about MiaoYan. You can use Hover button in the setting.
ğŸ­ Support embedding all kinds of interesting things, codepen/codeSandbox/youtube etc.
ğŸ©´ Miaoyan ppt optimizes a lot in combination with real use scenarios, and supports PDF export of PPT.
